availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, laborer. Caldwell County, Kentucky, native. Son of James B. Moore and Melinda Moore. Married to Harriett Moore. Father of Ellen Moore. Student in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Laborer in Lyon County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 314B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, p. 669.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Crittenden County, Precinct 2, p. 373A.
